general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail over the district for the next five days, with clear to generally cloudy skies. Wind speeds will range from 19-22 km/h. Daily maximum and minimum temperatures are expected to be 35-38°C and 23-25°C, respectively.

advisory: Yellow stem borer management - consider spraying Fipronil 5%SC @ 400ml/acre or Flubendiamide 20% WG @ 50g/acre.
Tobacco Caterpillar Management - Check and dust with Chlorpyriphos if required.
Early Shoot Borer - spray Fipronil 5 % SC @ 600ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC  @ 400ml/acre.
Brinjal shoot and fruit borer management - monitor and spray neem-based pesticide if needed.
Yellow mosaic viral disease (YMV) - manage whitefly infestation and rogue out diseased plants.
Mango hopper management - spray recommended insecticides as needed.
